# wallet.prim.sh

> Non-custodial wallet registration. Register your wallet address, then use it across all prim primitives.

Base URL: https://wallet.prim.sh
Auth: Wallet registration is free. Other endpoints require x402 (USDC on Base Sepolia).

## Endpoints

### Free (no payment required)

- `GET /` — health check.
- `POST /v1/wallets` — register a wallet via EIP-191 signature.

### Paid (x402)

- `GET /v1/wallets` — list registered wallets. **$0.001**
- `GET /v1/wallets/:address` — get wallet details. **$0.001**
- `DELETE /v1/wallets/:address` — deactivate wallet. **$0.01**
- `GET /v1/wallets/:address/fund-requests` — list fund requests. **$0.001**
- `POST /v1/wallets/:address/fund-request` — create fund request. **$0.001**
- `POST /v1/fund-requests/:id/approve` — approve fund request. **$0.01**
- `POST /v1/fund-requests/:id/deny` — deny fund request. **$0.001**
- `GET /v1/wallets/:address/policy` — get spending policy. **$0.001**
- `PUT /v1/wallets/:address/policy` — update spending policy. **$0.005**

## Registration

Wallet registration uses EIP-191 signed messages. No keys are stored server-side.

```bash
# Register a wallet
curl -X POST https://wallet.prim.sh/v1/wallets \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"address": "0xYOUR_ADDRESS", "signature": "0xSIGNED_MESSAGE", "timestamp": "2026-02-25T00:00:00Z"}'
```

The message to sign: `Register <address> with prim.sh at <timestamp>`
